description:
Luffy and Chopper fall into the rough cold sea along with the mysterious girl. Jimbei tries to help them but another attack comes from the unknown creature. Meanwhile, the Sunny is hit by torpedoes and the rest of the Straw Hats are thrown into the sea, too.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brimming with the Future! An Adventure on the Island of Science!
Mirai Mansai! Kagaku no Kuni no Bouken!
Un futur exaltant. Voyage au pays de la science !
Zukunft, so weit das Auge reicht! – Abenteuer im Wissenschaftsreich!
未来満載! 科学の国の冒険!
